medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe, acute epigastric and RUQ pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed the pain shortly after eating, beginning at 6:30 PM last evening. The pain is similar to prior pancreatitis pain but is not resolving. He also experienced nausea and vomited twice in the ED. He has had chills this morning and currently has a fever.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Pancreatitis, GERD, intermittent low back pain, multiple resistant UTIs.
medical_history.family_history: Father alive with thoracic aneurysm and prostate cancer. Mother died of pancreatic cancer at age unspecified. Maternal aunt with lung cancer (non-smoker).
medical_history.social_history: Consumes alcohol daily, including 2 glasses of wine each night and 3 scotches on the weekends.
